snippet.title: MLB The Show 22 - Cover Athlete Reveal: Defining A Legend - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
MLB The Show 22 is coming to Nintendo Switch for the first time ever on April 5th, 2022!

In MLB The Show 22 you play your game - just like the cover athlete and once in a generation talent, Shohei Ohtani. See how Shohei is having the biggest year in one hundred years.

Pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/mlb-the-show-22-switch/

#MLBTheShow #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
